# My First Blog created using Laravel

## Completed Features

1. User roles
  * Subscriber
  * Author
  * Editor
  * Admin
2. Post
  * User
  * Title
  * Body
  * Auto generated slugs

## Planned Features

1. Soft Deletes of Posts
2. Posts - publish, unpublish, publish date
